mission.posting: Yusa has to do something for someone she holds close to her heart.

email.subject: Yusa - Desperation Contd.
email.body: I've been looking more into what could save my brother. Kellis Biotech was probably the best place to look for something to save him. And I think there could be more to find. If we can find evidence of a prototype that could save him, that would mean the world to me. Please help me with this, #PLAYERNAME#. If you find anything, upload it to my drop server. -Yusa

attachments.note: Help Yusa find something to save her brother. Investigate Kellis Biotech. Look for evidence of a prototype.
